title: Did the "most deep hole on earth " close after having found" 2 billion ancient Fossel years? '
subtitle: There are two ways to get an answer to this question: pass through an unreasonable number of images in a clipping article, or read our quick answer here.

vclaim: The deepest hole on Earth was closed after a 2 billion-year-old fossil was found.
